description: Use your cigar lighter outlet to charge any devices (iPhone, iPod, MP3 Players, Digital Cameras, PDAs, Mobile Phones and more) that can rely on USB for power. This adapter plugs into your car's cigarette lighter jack to become a powered USB port.
title: elago Nano EL-Car-C1  USB Car Charger for iPhone, iPod, MP3 Players, Digital Cameras, PDAs, and Mobile Phones (Black)
